task.title: Create and Favorite a Saved Search

ul.li: A search query has been executed in Network Explorer.
The Save Search button is displayed.

context.p: To create and favorite a new Saved Search.

ol.li: In the Network Explorer main pages, click Save Search. The Save Search panel is displayed.
Enter Saved Search name. The Saved Search name can only contain alphanumeric characters (A-Z, a-z and 0-9), spaces and certain "special" characters. The supported "special" characters are: . - _
Choose Sharing Permissions. Saved Searches can be saved as public or private.
Click Save to save the search. The new Saved Search is displayed in the Saved Searches Tab under Network Panel.
Clicking on a Saved Search in the Saved Searches Tab, will display the Saved Search details and populate the results table
Click the . The star color changes to gold . This saved search is now displayed as a favorite search.

info.p: Note : Refresh Network Explorer for latest Information in Network Panel.

result.p: The Search is saved and displayed as a favorite.
